name: lmodsn0
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c2, cgrp))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wne(c1, emptycls))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LMod → c2 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ Grp → c1 ≠ ∅)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wne(c1, emptycls))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LMod → c2 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ Grp → c1 ≠ ∅)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ (c2 ∈ Grp → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ c2 =(Scalar ` c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ c2 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)

comment: The set of scalars in a left module is nonempty. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
